data.text/html:
Analyzing Raw Bepoz Data

To automate a sync between the bepoz databse and wine_wiki, we need to add some translations between the two data models. The most useful source of discriminatory data is the comment field, which contains the full wine name, producer, region, vintage, volume and more. Unfortunately different formats have emerged over time. While an endgoal would be a formalisation and correction of the source data, at the moment we will need to define some translation functions. To do this we need to identify subgroups, seperate them, then define functions which unify the data ready for ingestion into the wine-wiki database. At this time this notebook is not contained within the wine-wiki project and thus integration with the ORM is not possible, so we will focus on unification until we can integrate into that project.
Loading the Data

<marimo-ui-element object-id='bkHC-0' random-id='423f780a-48a7-0ce5-4432-25bae73c4542'><marimo-table data-initial-value='[]' data-label='null' data-data='"[{\"product_id\":31676,\"product_name\":\"A Bichot Moutonne G.C.22Cy\",\"allocation\":\"W D 4\",\"dimCosts\":243,\"dimComment\":243,\"dimSales\":243},{\"product_id\":30438,\"product_name\":\"A Christmann 21Ri Idig Gg\",\"allocation\":\"W E 5\",\"dimCosts\":645,\"dimComment\":645,\"dimSales\":645},{\"product_id\":30437,\"product_name\":\"A Christmann 21Ri Olberg Gg\",\"allocation\":\"W E 5\",\"dimCosts\":646,\"dimComment\":646,\"dimSales\":646},{\"product_id\":30439,\"product_name\":\"A Christmann 21Ri Vogelsang Gg\",\"allocation\":\"W E 5\",\"dimCosts\":644,\"dimComment\":644,\"dimSales\":644},{\"product_id\":31909,\"product_name\":\"A Lambert Cremant\",\"allocation\":\"W B 2 \",\"dimCosts\":116,\"dimComment\":116,\"dimSales\":116},{\"product_id\":31797,\"product_name\":\"A Perret Condrieu.C.D.C. 22Vi\",\"allocation\":\"W B 5\",\"dimCosts\":171,\"dimComment\":171,\"dimSales\":171},{\"product_id\":31798,\"product_name\":\"A Perret St Joseph 22Sz\",\"allocation\":\"C11 (86!)\",\"dimCosts\":170,\"dimComment\":170,\"dimSales\":170},{\"product_id\":30259,\"product_name\":\"A Sanzay 22Cf Saumur\",\"allocation\":\"R K M\",\"dimCosts\":655,\"dimComment\":655,\"dimSales\":655},{\"product_id\":31708,\"product_name\":\"A&G Fantino Bussia 17Nb\",\"allocation\":\"R E T\",\"dimCosts\":216,\"dimComment\":216,\"dimSales\":216},{\"product_id\":8613,\"product_name\":\"Agrapart Exp.12 D18\",\"allocation\":\"S08 (86!)\",\"dimCosts\":836,\"dimComment\":836,\"dimSales\":836}]"' data-total-rows='10' data-total-columns='6' data-max-columns='50' data-banner-text='""' data-pagination='true' data-page-size='10' data-field-types='[["product_id", ["integer", "int32"]], ["product_name", ["string", "object"]], ["allocation", ["string", "object"]], ["dimCosts", ["integer", "int32"]], ["dimComment", ["integer", "int32"]], ["dimSales", ["integer", "int32"]]]' data-show-filters='true' data-show-download='true' data-show-column-summaries='false' data-row-headers='[]' data-has-stable-row-id='false' data-lazy='false' data-preload='false'></marimo-table></marimo-ui-element>
we will focus on the comment field first, using Product Id as the primary key.

As we can see there are various formats found. We can also see some spelling errors which will need correction. Cleanup includes removing punctuation and whitespace from the ends of the strings. Stock with 0 qty on hand are also excluded, as they are not immediately pertinant to the wine wiki, and this a useful method of removing meta items such as pairing charges and other special menu items.

Identifiying which Entries end with (<volume>)

An evident discrimnatory factor is whether the string ends with a volume value or not.

<marimo-ui-element object-id='SFPL-0' random-id='7b5282fa-08d2-4ed8-837d-43ee8138abc1'><marimo-table data-initial-value='[]' data-label='null' data-data='"[{\"count(_comment)\":537}]"' data-total-rows='1' data-total-columns='1' data-max-columns='50' data-banner-text='""' data-pagination='true' data-page-size='10' data-field-types='[["count(_comment)", ["integer", "int64"]]]' data-show-filters='true' data-show-download='true' data-show-column-summaries='false' data-row-headers='[]' data-has-stable-row-id='false' data-lazy='false' data-preload='false'></marimo-table></marimo-ui-element>
only 607 entries end with 'ml)'. What do the others end with?

<marimo-ui-element object-id='RGSE-0' random-id='9a38d561-2efc-7196-6e9d-5567fa97c26f'><marimo-table data-initial-value='[]' data-label='null' data-data='"[{\"_comment\":\"yangarra 'roux beaute'roussanne. mclaren vale sa (750ml) \"},{\"_comment\":\"de salis estate pinot noir 2021 (750ml) \"},{\"_comment\":\"de salis cy 22 \"},{\"_comment\":\"de salis wild fume blanc 2023 \"},{\"_comment\":\"taittinger prelude champagne nv (750ml).base: 2017.disgorged: 2022\"},{\"_comment\":\"breaking ground barbera 2024 (750ml) \"},{\"_comment\":\"breaking ground albarinho 2024 (750ml) \"},{\"_comment\":\"nv aqua santa by castagna \"},{\"_comment\":\"hewitson mourvedre old garden vineyard 2021 (750ml) \"},{\"_comment\":\"mount mary reflection syrah 2022 (750ml) \"}]"' data-total-rows='289' data-total-columns='1' data-max-columns='50' data-banner-text='""' data-pagination='true' data-page-size='10' data-field-types='[["_comment", ["string", "object"]]]' data-show-filters='true' data-show-download='true' data-show-column-summaries='true' data-row-headers='[]' data-has-stable-row-id='false' data-lazy='false' data-preload='false'></marimo-table></marimo-ui-element>
A mish-mash. We should ignore these for now as they will need to be fixed manually.

Dividing the Comments into Common Patterns

There are a number of different formats of string, some which will require more work than others. To do this we will copy the 'raw_comment' table then move entries from the copy to their own tables, continuing until 'raw_comment_copy' is empty.

<marimo-ui-element object-id='Hstk-0' random-id='27fabbd3-758e-7151-e704-ffaaaeba01d3'><marimo-table data-initial-value='[]' data-label='null' data-data='"[{\"column_name\":\"pk\",\"column_type\":\"INTEGER\",\"null\":\"NO\",\"key\":\"PRI\",\"default\":\"nextval('dimCommentSeq')\",\"extra\":null},{\"column_name\":\"_comment\",\"column_type\":\"VARCHAR\",\"null\":\"YES\",\"key\":null,\"default\":null,\"extra\":null}]"' data-total-rows='2' data-total-columns='6' data-max-columns='50' data-banner-text='""' data-pagination='true' data-page-size='10' data-field-types='[["column_name", ["string", "object"]], ["column_type", ["string", "object"]], ["null", ["string", "object"]], ["key", ["string", "object"]], ["default", ["string", "object"]], ["extra", ["string", "object"]]]' data-show-filters='true' data-show-download='true' data-show-column-summaries='false' data-row-headers='[]' data-has-stable-row-id='false' data-lazy='false' data-preload='false'></marimo-table></marimo-ui-element>

<marimo-ui-element object-id='nWHF-0' random-id='b1a5eb72-aff9-c408-5b6c-563ecd920a96'><marimo-table data-initial-value='[]' data-label='null' data-data='"[{\"count_star()\":836}]"' data-total-rows='1' data-total-columns='1' data-max-columns='50' data-banner-text='""' data-pagination='true' data-page-size='10' data-field-types='[["count_star()", ["integer", "int64"]]]' data-show-filters='true' data-show-download='true' data-show-column-summaries='false' data-row-headers='[]' data-has-stable-row-id='false' data-lazy='false' data-preload='false'></marimo-table></marimo-ui-element>
Segregating Champagnes
Champagnes are significantly different, as they do not end with the volume.

<marimo-ui-element object-id='ROlb-0' random-id='64efb6d5-83e8-117d-ebbe-505d67492ebe'><marimo-table data-initial-value='[]' data-label='null' data-data='"[{\"pk\":29,\"_comment\":\"taittinger prelude champagne nv (750ml).base: 2017.disgorged: 2022\",\"clean_grp_label\":\"champagne\"},{\"pk\":65,\"_comment\":\"cedric bouchard roses de jeanne les ursules blanc de noirs 2020 (750ml) (d-24)\",\"clean_grp_label\":\"champagne\"},{\"pk\":66,\"_comment\":\"cedric bouchard roses de jeanne 'vv-cote de val vilaine' blanc de noirs 2022 (750ml) (d-24)\",\"clean_grp_label\":\"champagne\"},{\"pk\":67,\"_comment\":\"frederic savart le mont benoit premier cru extra brut chardonnay/pinot noir 2020 (750ml) (d-11/24)\",\"clean_grp_label\":\"champagne\"},{\"pk\":87,\"_comment\":\"henriot non vintage.disgorged 2023 \",\"clean_grp_label\":\"champagne\"},{\"pk\":143,\"_comment\":\"la closerie grand cru (jerome & agnes prevost) base: 2022.disgorged: 09/2024\",\"clean_grp_label\":\"champagne\"},{\"pk\":145,\"_comment\":\"la closerie les beguines (750ml) .base: 2022.disgorged: 09/2024\",\"clean_grp_label\":\"champagne\"},{\"pk\":147,\"_comment\":\"la closerie champagne  (750ml) .base: 2022.disgorged: 09/2024.\",\"clean_grp_label\":\"champagne\"},{\"pk\":175,\"_comment\":\"egly-ouriet grand cru blanc de noirs v.v. champagne nv (750ml) d12.17\",\"clean_grp_label\":\"champagne\"}]"' data-has-stable-row-id='false' data-lazy='false' data-preload='false'></marimo-table></marimo-ui-element>

Building Volume Field

As we progress in cleaning up the comment string, important information should be moved into dedicated fields, simplifying the remaining comment string. An easy one is the bottle volume. The majority have "(750ml)" in the string, or "(1500ml)", but some do not. First we will add a volume field then fill it out, then seperate entries without a standard volume expression to create specialised logic before merging back in.

<marimo-ui-element object-id='TqIu-0' random-id='35ae8ab5-9117-6d78-e5d8-80f0633b3c9a'><marimo-table data-initial-value='[]' data-label='null' data-data='"[]"' data-total-rows='0' data-total-columns='3' data-max-columns='50' data-banner-text='""' data-pagination='true' data-page-size='10' data-field-types='[["pk", ["integer", "int32"]], ["volume", ["string", "object"]], ["ext_comment", ["string", "object"]]]' data-show-filters='true' data-show-download='true' data-show-column-summaries='false' data-row-headers='[]' data-has-stable-row-id='false' data-lazy='false' data-preload='false'></marimo-table></marimo-ui-element>

<marimo-ui-element object-id='Vxnm-0' random-id='92bc4c81-27b2-3f2e-588b-34e80e318459'><marimo-table data-initial-value='[]' data-label='null' data-data='"[{\"pk\":1,\"volume\":\"750\",\"ext_comment\":\"2022 bourke & travers gsm \"},{\"pk\":2,\"volume\":\"750\",\"ext_comment\":\"2024 moorak pinot meunier oakbank \"},{\"pk\":3,\"volume\":\"750\",\"ext_comment\":\"2022 now nicole oatley wines cabernet franc \"},{\"pk\":4,\"volume\":\"750\",\"ext_comment\":\"2023 now nicole oatley wines chenin blanc \"},{\"pk\":5,\"volume\":\"750\",\"ext_comment\":\"2022 pierre-yves colin-morey chassagne-montrachet vieilles vignes \"},{\"pk\":6,\"volume\":\"750\",\"ext_comment\":\"2022 pierre-yves colin-morey monthelie blanc \"},{\"pk\":7,\"volume\":\"750\",\"ext_comment\":\"2022 caroline morey chassagne-montrachet chambrees \"},{\"pk\":8,\"volume\":\"750\",\"ext_comment\":\"2022 bindi dhillon glenhope vineyard chardonnay \"},{\"pk\":9,\"volume\":\"750\",\"ext_comment\":\"2022 bindi block 5 pinot noir \"},{\"pk\":10,\"volume\":\"750\",\"ext_comment\":\"2022 bindi block 8 pinot noir \"}]"' data-total-rows='836' data-total-columns='3' data-max-columns='50' data-banner-text='""' data-pagination='true' data-page-size='10' data-field-types='[["pk", ["integer", "int32"]], ["volume", ["string", "object"]], ["ext_comment", ["string", "object"]]]' data-show-filters='true' data-show-download='true' data-show-column-summaries='true' data-row-headers='[]' data-has-stable-row-id='false' data-lazy='false' data-preload='false'></marimo-table></marimo-ui-element>

Extracting Vintage

<marimo-ui-element object-id='Pvdt-0' random-id='0ea8a515-1d64-c3b5-4256-73bdcc7819b7'><marimo-table data-initial-value='[]' data-label='null' data-data='"[{\"pk\":1,\"ext_comment\":\"bourke & travers gsm (750ml)\",\"vintage\":\"2022\"},{\"pk\":2,\"ext_comment\":\"moorak pinot meunier oakbank (750ml)\",\"vintage\":\"2024\"},{\"pk\":3,\"ext_comment\":\"now nicole oatley wines cabernet franc (750ml)\",\"vintage\":\"2022\"},{\"pk\":4,\"ext_comment\":\"now nicole oatley wines chenin blanc (750ml)\",\"vintage\":\"2023\"},{\"pk\":5,\"ext_comment\":\"pierre-yves colin-morey chassagne-montrachet vieilles vignes (750ml)\",\"vintage\":\"2022\"},{\"pk\":6,\"ext_comment\":\"pierre-yves colin-morey monthelie blanc (750ml)\",\"vintage\":\"2022\"},{\"pk\":7,\"ext_comment\":\"caroline morey chassagne-montrachet chambrees (750ml)\",\"vintage\":\"2022\"},{\"pk\":8,\"ext_comment\":\"bindi dhillon glenhope vineyard chardonnay (750ml)\",\"vintage\":\"2022\"},{\"pk\":9,\"ext_comment\":\"bindi block 5 pinot noir (750ml)\",\"vintage\":\"2022\"},{\"pk\":10,\"ext_comment\":\"bindi block 8 pinot noir (750ml)\",\"vintage\":\"2022\"}]"' data-total-rows='836' data-total-columns='3' data-max-columns='50' data-banner-text='""' data-pagination='true' data-page-size='10' data-field-types='[["pk", ["integer", "int32"]], ["ext_comment", ["string", "object"]], ["vintage", ["string", "object"]]]' data-show-filters='true' data-show-download='true' data-show-column-summaries='true' data-row-headers='[]' data-has-stable-row-id='false' data-lazy='false' data-preload='false'></marimo-table></marimo-ui-element>

Extracting Varietals

The next step is to extract all varietals. First we need to add a list of varietals then match the comment string to the varietal (or list of) then remove the varietals from the string.

<marimo-ui-element object-id='aLJB-0' random-id='6c0d75c9-4168-6b59-b2fd-fb9580fb7bae'><marimo-table data-initial-value='[]' data-label='null' data-data='"[{\"pk\":1,\"variety\":\"agiorgitiko\",\"variety_cleaned\":\"agiorgitiko\"},{\"pk\":2,\"variety\":\"aglianico\",\"variety_cleaned\":\"aglianico\"},{\"pk\":3,\"variety\":\"air\\u00e9n\",\"variety_cleaned\":\"airen\"},{\"pk\":4,\"variety\":\"albari\\u00f1o-alvarinho\",\"variety_cleaned\":\"albarino alvarinho\"},{\"pk\":5,\"variety\":\"alicante-bouschet\",\"variety_cleaned\":\"alicante bouschet\"},{\"pk\":6,\"variety\":\"aligot\\u00e9\",\"variety_cleaned\":\"aligote\"},{\"pk\":7,\"variety\":\"arinto\",\"variety_cleaned\":\"arinto\"},{\"pk\":8,\"variety\":\"arneis\",\"variety_cleaned\":\"arneis\"},{\"pk\":9,\"variety\":\"assyrtiko\",\"variety_cleaned\":\"assyrtiko\"},{\"pk\":10,\"variety\":\"baga\",\"variety_cleaned\":\"baga\"}]"' data-total-rows='122' data-total-columns='3' data-max-columns='50' data-banner-text='""' data-pagination='true' data-page-size='10' data-field-types='[["pk", ["integer", "int32"]], ["variety", ["string", "object"]], ["variety_cleaned", ["string", "object"]]]' data-show-filters='true' data-show-download='true' data-show-column-summaries='true' data-row-headers='[]' data-has-stable-row-id='false' data-lazy='false' data-preload='false'></marimo-table></marimo-ui-element>
